= camel cmd stop-route

Stop Camel routes


== Usage

[source,bash]
----
camel cmd stop-route [options]
----



== Options

[cols="2,5,1,2",options="header"]
|===
| Option | Description | Default | Type
| `--id` | Route ids (multiple ids can be separated by comma) | * | String
| `-h,--help` | Display the help and sub-commands |  | boolean
|===
